snippet: A criminal court on Monday sentenced two Coptic Christians to three years in prison for stealing weapons from soldiers during a 2011 clash that left more than two dozen Copts dead.
abstract: Egyptian court sentences two Coptic Christians to three years in prison for stealing weapons from soldiers during 2011 clash that left more than two dozen Copts dead
lead_paragraph: A criminal court on Monday sentenced two Coptic Christians to three years in prison for stealing weapons from soldiers during a 2011 clash that left more than two dozen Copts dead.

headline.seo: Two Coptic Christians Sentenced in Egypt
headline.main: Egypt: Two Coptic Christians Sentenced for Stealing Weapons
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Two Coptic Christians Sentenced for Stealing Weapons
